title: Bug splat
body: I have a bug splat in the last 2 days all the time..as i am in the champion select when i lock in my champion the client bug splating and it is working at the back ground i can hear voices but i cant see anything..the client is loading and i cannot change anything (masteries-runes-spells)and at the end it closes.I tried everything that it says in support site in league of legends and it is not working anything.Do you have the same promblem or ou had if yes how did you fix it?

replies.body: same here dude and ive now been put in low queue waits.
